radiographic_examinations.findings: Suggestive of severe mitral regurgitation, but images were technically suboptimal.

Intact mitral leaflets, marked disruption and fistulization of the anterior mitral annulus with a 9 Ã— 7 mm irregular opening at the base of the A2/A3 mitral valve scallops, characteristic Doppler signal of mitral regurgitation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Demonstrated an acquired left ventricular to left atrial fistula as a result of rapid deceleration injury from a fall.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal, without evidence of valvular pathology.
